com.k2.Util.Version

Interface Version

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleVersion

    public interface Version
    The Version interface defines a 3 part version number, comprised of major, minor and point version numbers.
    Author:
    simon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Version create()
      Create the default initial version "v0.0.0"
      static Version create(int major, int minor, int point)
      Create a version for the given major, minor and point version numbers
      boolean includes(Version ver)
      Check whether the given version is this or an earlier version.
      void increment(Increment inc)
      Increment the version, changing the defined number component If the point number is to be changed then just the point number is incremented If the minor number is to be changed then the minor version number is incremented and the point number is set to zero If the major number is to be changed then the major version number is incremeted and the point and minor numbers are set to zero.
      int major()
      Get the major version number
      int minor()
      Get the minor version number
      int point()
      Get the point version number

    • Method Detail

      • create

        static Version create()
        Create the default initial version "v0.0.0"
        Returns:
        An implementation of the Version interface with the version number v0.0.0

      • create

        static Version create(int major,
                      int minor,
                      int point)
        Create a version for the given major, minor and point version numbers
        Parameters:
        major - The major number of the version
        minor - The minor number of the version
        point - The point number of the version
        Returns:
        An implementation of the Version interface with the given version numbers

      • increment

        void increment(Increment inc)
        Increment the version, changing the defined number component If the point number is to be changed then just the point number is incremented If the minor number is to be changed then the minor version number is incremented and the point number is set to zero If the major number is to be changed then the major version number is incremeted and the point and minor numbers are set to zero.
        Parameters:
        inc - Change the major, minor or point version number

      • includes

        boolean includes(Version ver)
        Check whether the given version is this or an earlier version.
        Parameters:
        ver - The version to compare to this version
        Returns:
        True if this version is on or after the given version

      • major

        int major()
        Get the major version number
        Returns:
        The major version number

      • minor

        int minor()
        Get the minor version number
        Returns:
        The minor version number

      • point

        int point()
        Get the point version number
        Returns:
        The point version number.
